verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Up from the grave
He arose,
With a mighty triumph
o'er His foes;

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
He arose a victor
from the dark domain
And He lives forever
With His saints to reign.

verse.name: c1c
verse.lines:
He arose!
He arose!
Hallelujah!
Christ arose!

verse.name: v1a
verse.lines:
Low in the grave He lay,
Jesus my Savior!

verse.name: v1b
verse.lines:
Waiting the coming day,
Jesus my Lord!

verse.name: v2a
verse.lines:
Vainly they watch His bed,
Jesus my Savior!

verse.name: v2b
verse.lines:
Vainly they seal the dead,
Jesus my Lord!

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
Death cannot keep his prey,
Jesus my Savior!

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines:
He tore the bars away,
Jesus my Lord!
